entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who thought the effect was good. The text does not provide any further information about Harry.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is the potions master who is offering a prize in this lesson. He shows the students a minuscule glass bottle of Felix Felicis and explains its effects.

entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: Felix Felicis is a potion that gives the drinker luck for twelve hours. It is banned in organised competitions, but can be used on an ordinary day to make it extraordinary.

relationships.description: Slughorn has a minuscule glass bottle of Felix Felicis in his pocket.
Slughorn is offering the prize of Felix Felicis to Harry and the other students.
